'''Radiant Spincrystal 38''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Peaceful Hike (Qingce Daytime)]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a chair near [[Chang the Ninth]] in [[Qingce Village]].
